title: PBE and Alpha Client Relations
body:
Okay so I recently got into the Alpha Client which I submitted the application for a few months after I submitted my PBE application. I just wanted to if the two (PBE and Alpha Client) had any similarities for being accepted. Thanks in advance.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Both the [PBE ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)and [Alpha](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/signup) applications do ask that players be in good standing.  The applications are independent, though.  One might be accepted into PBE but it wouldn't guarantee Alpha and vice versa.   Hopefully that helps clear some things up, but hit me up if you have any questions.
